name: Masquerade (itch)
description:
You are an assassin who has been tasked with the killing of a high profile senator at a masquerade ball. Track down the anonymous Senator and lure him outside for the kill. An incorrect kill will expose our organization, and you will be punished. Harshly.

Use WASD or arrow keys to move and navigate dialogue, and use the mouse pointer to interact with things as you face them.

72 hours ago, a few friends set up shop in a basement for their first ever Ludum Dare attempt. Three days, lots of coffee, and thousands of lines of poorly optimized spaghetti code later, and this is what we have produced. Hope you enjoy it!

The source code can be found at https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B8OHvi2oAYSBdnJrMXQ4QUNBUjA?usp=sharing
